dmca.title: Mesotheliomaweb complains of metastatizing text (6)
dmca.body:
Sir/Madam: 
I write to complain about some Blogger blogs that have copied material from a website owned by one of my clients. 
1. The copyrighted work at issue is text that appears on the website Mesotheliomaweb.org. 
2. The pages that infringe are: 
http://about-mesothelioma.blogspot.com/2005/05/all-about-mesothelioma.html 
is a copy of http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/mesothe1ioma.htrn 
http://gulfdating.blogspot.com/2005/10/about-malignant-mesothelioma.html is also a copy of http://www.mesotheliomaweb.orglmesothelioma.htm 
http://boomblogs.blogspot.com/2005/all-about-malignant-mesothelioma.html is also a copy of http://www.mesotheliomaweb.orglmesothelioma.htm 
3. My name is [private]. My e-mail address is [private]@sitecoach.com. 
4. According to the registrar whois.markmonitor.com, the contact information for this site is: 
Google Inc. 
(DOM-345046) 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway Mountain View 
CA 
94043 US 
Domain Name: blogspot.eom 
5l-2a3-2s71 p.? 
Administrative Contact: 
DNS Admin 
(NIC-1467103) 
Google Inc. 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway Mountain View 
CA 
94043 US 
dns-admingoog1e.corn +1.[private] Fax- +1.[private]
I cannot identify the individual bloggers who made the offending posts. 
5.I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the 
allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 
6. I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that 1 am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 
Sincerely, 
[private]
